themes.name: AI Infrastructure Buildout
themes.description: Enterprise and cloud providers accelerating AI infrastructure investments; semiconductor, data center, and AI software companies benefiting from sustained capital allocation.

themes.name: Consumer Financial Resilience Amid Economic Pessimism
themes.description: Despite concerns about the broader economy, consumer sentiment remains relatively stable, leading to potential growth in consumer discretionary sectors as spending patterns evolve.

themes.name: Regulatory and Policy Shifts in Financial Markets
themes.description: Potential changes in fiscal policies, such as proposed tariff dividends and mortgage reforms, could influence consumer spending and investment strategies, impacting financial and housing sectors.

themes.name: Sustainable Energy Transition
themes.description: Continued investment in renewable energy and sustainability initiatives driven by regulatory support and consumer demand, benefiting clean energy and technology sectors.

themes.name: Healthcare Innovation and Biotech Advancements
themes.description: Ongoing advancements in biotechnology and healthcare technologies, spurred by demographic shifts and increased healthcare spending, creating opportunities in biotech and health tech sectors.

themes.name: Infrastructure Investment Surge
themes.description: Increased government and private sector spending on infrastructure projects, driven by regulatory support and economic recovery efforts, benefiting construction, materials, and industrial sectors.

themes.name: Geopolitical Tensions and Supply Chain Resilience
themes.description: Ongoing geopolitical developments affecting supply chains and trade policies, leading companies to invest in supply chain resilience and localization strategies, impacting manufacturing and logistics sectors.

themes.name: Shift Towards Value and Defensive Stocks
themes.description: Market rotation towards value and defensive stocks as investors seek stability amid volatility in growth sectors, particularly in the context of rising interest rates and inflation concerns.
